thread.title: text dissapearing?

comments.text: ive been making a help dialoge in my club and randomly after a certain amount of text is placed it all just kind of dissapears...
sorry for that, we currently have some text limit. what area is this so we can look into this some more?
my nightclub [area:nightclub raves-parties-fun] message me and ill show you whenever your on if you can
